block.p: MARTIN-Maryann. Age 42. Cherished fiancee of Robert Alfano. Beloved daughter of the late Alice and George. Loving sister of Carleen Fuentes, George and Michael. Dear granddaugher of Rita Green. Employee of D.L.J. Investment Banking. Reposing at Marine Park Funeral Home, 3024 Quentin Road, Brooklyn. Funeral Mass St. Bernard's Church, Monday, 9:30AM. Visiting hours Sunday 2-5 and 7-10PM.
